module.exports = {         
    colors :["red" ,"green" ,"blue"],
        name :'esfmt',
    doSomething(){
    // some comment
        return   'I said, "hi!"'
    }
}
---
module.exports = {
    colors: [ "red", "green", "blue" ],
    name: "esfmt",
    doSomething() {
        // some comment
        return "I said, \"hi!\"";
    }
};
